sub_title: Manager - IWRM for Climate Smart Agriculture
summary: Postdoc researcher at Water Systems and Global Change, Wageningen University, and Research specialization in climate services co-production. Skilled in project management and publishing scientific outcomes. Working as a professional for 14 years. Scientific interests - Public engagement, inter-and transdisciplinary research on water, climate, and society. Interested in an academic staff/researcher position.
